full_summary:
# 60kW Propane Powered Standby Generator
## Government Tender Announcement

### Background

Parks Canada Agency is seeking proposals from qualified vendors to supply and deliver one (1) minimum 60 kilowatt skid mount standby generator powered by propane (LP) gas to the Water pumphouse facility located in the townsite of Waskesiu Lake, Saskatchewan within Prince Albert National Park of Canada.

### Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: WS3561040885
* Amendment Number: 2
* Publication Date: 2022-10-26
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-11-14T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2022-11-08
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2022-11-30
* Expected Contract End Date: 2023-03-31

### Supply and Delivery Requirements

The contractor will be required to supply a minimum 60kW propane generator, deliver the generator to the site specified within the Statement of Requirements, and install the generator in the water pumphouse facility. The building where the generator will be installed is insulated and heated, therefore the generator casing is not required, and the generator skid will be bolted to the floor.

### Evaluation Criteria

The selection of the successful vendor will be based on the lowest price proposal.

### Important Dates and Contact Information

* Tender Closing Date: 2022-11-14T14:00:00
* Contact Name: Dino Cavalic, Director (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: dino.cavalic@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14472549?extsite=MTQ0NzI1NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Additional Information

This tender is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to qualified vendors from Canada and other countries. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on this solicitation.  Note: Please disregard the initial posting closing time and bid submission must be submitted by November 14, 2022 at 14:00 EST.
